ticket.title: Some problem with session
ticket.original-body: I use authlogic 1.4.0 and after changing rails version to 2.3.0 I can't login to application using Opera. On firefox everything works fine, so possibly it's cookies based sessions bug.
ticket.latest-body: I use authlogic 1.4.0 and after changing rails version to 2.3.0 I can't login to application using Opera. On firefox everything works fine, so possibly it's cookies based sessions bug.
ticket.original-body-html: I use authlogic 1.4.0 and after changing rails version to 2.3.0 I can't login to application using Opera. On firefox everything works fine, so possibly it's cookies based sessions bug.

version.body-html: I use authlogic 1.4.0 and after changing rails version to 2.3.0 I can't login to application using Opera. On firefox everything works fine, so possibly it's cookies based sessions bug.
version.title: Some problem with session

version.body: Please get in contact with the authlogic authors and have them produce a bug report with a failing tests or otherwise further pinning down the problem. We can't really take a lot of action without that.
version.body-html: Please get in contact with the authlogic authors and have them produce a bug report with a failing tests or otherwise further pinning down the problem. We can't really take a lot of action without that.
version.title: Some problem with session

version.body:
@drogus Are you using Mongrel by chance? How about cookie store for sessions? I'm trying to track down an existing ticket for an issue I'm having with Mongrel, Rails 2.3, and cookie stored sessions.
@dhh Know of such a ticket/issue?
version.body-html:
@drogus Are you using Mongrel by chance? How about cookie store for sessions? I'm trying to track down an existing ticket for an issue I'm having with Mongrel, Rails 2.3, and cookie stored sessions.

@dhh Know of such a ticket/issue?
